tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE software_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  software_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  version VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  release_date DATE NOT NULL,
  patch_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patches (
  patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  update_id INT,
  patch_description TEXT,
  patch_version VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (update_id) REFERENCES software_updates(update_id)
);

CREATE TABLE software_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  software_name VARCHAR(50),
  version VARCHAR(20),
  update_date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patches (
	patch_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	update_id INT REFERENCES software_updates(update_id),
	patch_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	size_mb DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
	patch_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patches (
	patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	software_name VARCHAR(255),
	patch_version VARCHAR(50),
	patch_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (software_name) REFERENCES software_updates(software_name)
);

CREATE TABLE system_software (
	system_id INT,
	software_name VARCHAR(255),
	installed_version VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES systems(system_id),
	PRIMARY KEY (system_id, software_name)
);

CREATE TABLE system_patches (
	system_id INT,
	patch_id INT,
	applied_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES systems(system_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (patch_id) REFERENCES patches(patch_id),
	PRIMARY KEY (system_id, patch_id)
);
